Modification_Details_Page.heading: Modification details
Modification_Details_Page.next_steps_guidance: When you've completed your review of all the information on this page, continue to the next step where you'll enter the review outcome

Modification_Review_Outcome_Section.review_comment_guidance: If you have any comments on this document add them to the box below. Comments are only visible to other reviewers and are not shared with the applicant.
Modification_Review_Outcome_Section.review_outcome_guidance: You'll be able to check the outcome again before sending to the applicant in the next steps

Modification_Not_Approved_Section.not_approved_comment_guidance: Enter the reason this modification was not approved

Modification_Unfinished_Error_Page.heading: You cannot proceed with ‘Unfinished’ changes
Modification_Unfinished_Error_Page.modification_unfinished_hint_label: All changes must have the status 'ready for submission' before you can continue. For any changes with the status 'Unfinished', either select Change to enter missing information, or select Remove if that change is no longer needed.

Remove_Modifications_Page.heading: Are you sure you want to remove Change to planned end date?
Remove_Modifications_Page.remove_modification_success_message: Change to planned end date has been removed

Modification_Details_Label_Texts.supporting_documents_sub_label: If any of the changes you're making involve an update to any project documents, make sure you add a copy of the original and updated documents.
Modification_Details_Label_Texts.add_summary_heading_label: Add summary and review modification before sending to sponsor
Modification_Details_Label_Texts.add_summary_sub_label: You'll have the option to add a brief summary and edit your modification before sending it to the sponsor on the next page.

Modification_Outcome_Reasons.Lack_Of_Evidence: There is a lack of evidence provided
Modification_Outcome_Reasons.Valid_Reason: Modification details are verified and approved
Modification_Outcome_Reasons.Valid_Reason_Not_Approved: Modification is not approved by the review body for valid reasons
